summary: An ordinance amending Section one (1) of Ordinance No. 53674, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 8th Avenue Northwest, from Leary Avenue to West 85th Street; providing for the establishing of curb grades of 8th Avenue Northwest, from said Leary Avenue to said West 85th Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting said streets and avenues, and providing that the entire cost of improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law", approved the 7th day of September, 1927.
